name: Infinity
description:
Infinity is a team of passionate and creative, digital enthusiasts who view the sky as the limit. The company offers full service expertise in the digital space; comprising digital strategy, usability, SEO, user experience, design, and programming skill-sets. They can fulfill all strategy, brand, design, front-end development and CMS development services.
They’ve produced incredible websites and have ongoing digital strategy partnerships with large multi-nationals including Westpac and Hyundai.
